content.en: Pose Estimation: Deep learning algorithms have made significant advancements in human pose estimation from monocular images, utilizing techniques such as convolutional neural networks and geometric priors. These algorithms can estimate human motion capture, 3D pose, and spatial relationships between joints. They can also achieve efficient multi-person pose estimation and integrate 2D and 3D pose estimation. Additionally, deep learning methods have been surveyed and reviewed for their effectiveness in 3D human pose estimation.
content.da: Poseskitsering: Deep learning-algoritmer har gjort betydelige fremskridt inden for estimering af menneskelige positurer fra monokulære billeder ved at bruge teknikker såsom konvolutionelle neurale netværk og geometriske præmisser. Disse algoritmer kan estimere menneskelig bevægelsesfangst, 3D-positur og rumlige relationer mellem led. De kan også opnå effektiv flerpersoners poseskitsering og integrere 2D og 3D poseskitsering. Derudover er deep learning-metoder blevet undersøgt og gennemgået for deres effektivitet i 3D-menneskepositur-estimering.
